message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1000000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price tailored to reflect its importance to you. My proposed offer is $950000. This is a special opportunity, and I believe it represents a fair compromise that benefits both parties. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.
